definition: album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: Most importantly, this album has a stamp of Metallica written all over it.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，這張專輯的郵票金屬書面所有權。

sentences.english: In May, we reported about a new album from singer Josh Groban.
sentences.chinese: 五月份，我們報道過一張喬許葛洛班的新專輯。

sentences.english: The album itself sold over two-million copies and reached the Top 20.
sentences.chinese: 這張專輯本身的銷量超過兩百萬份，並達到前20名。

sentences.english: How does the query specify the albums you want?
sentences.chinese: 那麼查詢又是如何指定所需的專輯呢？

sentences.english: Some of my friends have said that it's their favorite album.
sentences.chinese: 我的一些朋友們還說這是他們最喜歡的專輯。

sentences.english: The album is, in many ways, autobiographical.
sentences.chinese: 在很大程度上，這張專輯就是我的自傳。

sentences.english: The songs on this album became popular hits and were broadcast on television and radio station throughout Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 專輯歌曲如此暢銷，阿富汗全國電視電臺紛紛播送。

sentences.english: The album's title track is climbing high on the Country chart.
sentences.chinese: 這張專輯的主打歌，是對國家攀登高圖表。

sentences.english: For the first album, it was mostly my tracks.
sentences.chinese: 但是第一張專輯裏大部分錄的是我的音。
接下來是一盤10支曲目的專輯《祖羅帕》。

sentences.english: Ms Stefanie Sun burst onto the Chinese music scene with her eponymous debut album in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿在2000年憑藉同名專輯進入華語樂壇。

sentences.english: Their self-titled debut album was highly successful in Britain and Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他們自己的首張專輯是高度在英國和澳大利亞的成功。

sentences.english: Out by Into Eternity, from their album The Scattering of Ashes.
sentences.chinese: 由成永恆，從他們的專輯骨灰撒海。

sentences.english: "Remind Me, " the new single from the album, features Carrie Underwood.
sentences.chinese: “提醒我”的新單曲的專輯，功能凱莉安德伍德。

sentences.english: All and TVXQ association's non-special edition audio frequency and so on this area issue.
sentences.chinese: 所有和神起團體的非專輯音頻下載等都將在此區發佈。
